attributes.action: Make e-scooters legal to reduce our carbon footprint / cut emissions.
attributes.additional_details: Using e-scooters that are designed to be more durable can reduce environmental impacts from the materials used to build them on a per-mile traveled basis. Improving collection and distribution processes could reduce driving distances, and companies could use more fuel-efficient vehicles to collect the scooter.
attributes.background: Make electric scooters legal, by doing this we will make people’s commute easier and reduce the carbon footprint. This is a big issue and something has to be done. They are similar to bikes: they are easy to control and compact so can be picked up and carried.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332067
